events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but it doesn’t fit at all and I would like to request a refund.
The customer reports a refund request due to an item that does not fit properly.
Assigning case to refund department to handle the return and refund process.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t fit. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in original packaging?
My order number is 789654123. The jacket is brand new and hasn’t been worn outside. It’s still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details! Please use the prepaid return label we’re sending to your email to send back the jacket, and we’ll process your refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for your help! I’ll send the jacket back today and look forward to the refund.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
We’re closing this case as resolved. Please contact us anytime if you have further questions or need assistance.
